content.label: I finished this game back in the day and I miss it.  Please please revisit it for new levels.  It really is one of the most fun games I have ever played!
No support for the iPhone X screen

Fun, Challenging and Comedic 

With no forced ads, plenty of content and everything listed above I think this game is one of the best on the AppStore

title.label: Paid game or free to play. Choose

content.label: I have a strict policy on games. Either you pay for the game, or there are in-app power ups that you can buy. I like paying for games because the in-app $ games are generally crap. I really hate paying for a game to find out its also the "make it hard so they buy stuff" type. Auto 1 star. You can't monetize both ways.

Great game! I used to play this when I was about 5 years old, and when later on, my dad deleted it, because he had finished it. When I got much older, I really wanted to play it again, because for some odd reason, something reminded me of it. I searched everything that would relate to the title, and it could never find it. Then years later, I was about to go on my moms ipad, and suddenly I saw the game, and it reminded me so much of my childhood. Now, I love playing it and it's probably one of my favorite games! Also, I would love an update with more levels! Amazing game keep up the great work!

This game is actually my favorite game on the App Store right now. It‚Äôs great if you really need to pass the time but after you finish all the levels you feel like you want to play it again because it was so much fun. They should honestly add more levels or add a feature where you could create levels.

I had previously downloaded this app when it was free and played almost all of the levels that come with it, however when I went to re-download it today it said it would cost $6 and I thought ‚ÄúOh, I guess they added more as a part of this. It was a fun game before and I want to see how it improved.‚Äù When I opened the app I was disappointed to find that not only was it the same in pretty much every way, it also requires me to pay not just to use the power ups but also to play any more of the story than I had access to as a free-to-play customer.

title.label: Great game and I love the kraken pack

content.label: I played this game when I was like 7 years old and a year later I deleted the game and when I re downloaded the game there was the kraken pack and plus I still love the game and it would make a great movie if there is one in the future

Hey I just want to say I hope you guys at nitrome respond to this but I just want to tell you I have lots of ideas for a 5th chapter like it could be in a type of factory or another town like hammerfest of a castle and an underwater base but in Norse mythology there is so much you could do with this game.
Muy,muy entretenido. Mi agradecimiento a los desarrolladores y so√±ar por un rato que no todo es dinero en este mundo. Gracias
A little challenging, makes you think it out enjoy playing
üòÑ

It's an OK game. Need a directions place to review when needed. 
Not as juvenile as most games out there now.  Could do WITHOUT all of the useless, narrative air bubbles. 
Perhaps animate the trolls, throw in some dragons, a Loki...

Please do one more map pack and have the chief's troll side as the final boss please I want to fight him I even tried drawing a picture of what the boss fight should look like PLEEEEEEEEASE do another map pack!!!! (P.S. I think the chief is the two headed troll.) P.P.S. Pls do more levels kthxbai.

Imagine a world in which you buy a game and then don't have ads and in-app purchases constantly shoved down your throat. Seriously, close your eyes and dream. Now, buy a Nitrome game and experience that world. My love for Nitrome aside, Icebreaker is just plain fun, a great mobile puzzler with enough optional challenges to allow the novice to progress and the pro to squeeze some extra value and enjoyment out of this great game. Also, I love the 16-bit aesthetic. The sound design is phenomenal too. Get this game!

I absolutely love this game, it kept me occupied for quite a few days while traveling and sitting in airports. I fell more in love with this game the farther I progressed and was devastated when it was all over. I hope new levels come soon!

After offering their app for free on the AppStore, Nitrome pulled a fast one (in the form of a dodgy update) and saddled what was once a great game with more ads than anyone could possibly bear. They promised free daily God power-ups, but never came through. Because I was hell-bent on completing the missions, I disabled wifi, just so I could free myself from the constant barrage of interruptions. I downgraded my review, and deleted this dog. Greed never wins.

Great textures' GREAT sound track' idea is great'
And a little humor' and lots of fun!!!! (And cutting) would definitely recommend the game to kids 10-18.
Tons of fun, challenging and creative! Good physics. Love that there are multiple ways to pass levels.

title.label: Seriously one of the best physics puzzlers out there

content.label: I slogged through Angry Birds like the best of us, but to to tell you the truth, it kinda got old. Not so for this gem. It keeps you engaged with unique puzzles, a great sense of humor, and even a little narrative from our Viking friends. And the gorgeous pixel art doesn't hurt a bit. Buy this if you're not cold hearted.

The game itself is great, definitely recommend it for anybody who likes puzzles. However, the part that seems to be important to everybody is the ads. People who got the game for free also got way too many ads. I bought the game at full price and only encounter a full-screen ad every now and then. In my experience, the ads are no where near as bad as some other games.
Ridiculous amount of ads. Enough said....
Strategic physics game that's fun. Sure the ads are annoying but the game is fun
All the pop up adds have ruined this game. Don't waste your time with this malarkey.

title.label: Won't let me even get on

content.label:
I want my money back unless u fix this soon 
It keeps crashing every time i try to join
If this game was free the ads would be ok but rlly??
I already paid $3 for this game, why are there ads in it? Ridiculous.

This was a fun game, and the ads were roadie.  Now, they show up after every scene.  This app is going in the trash heap.  C'mon, 20 seconds of game play followed by an ad that you have to wait for a timer?  So pathetic.

title.label: AD's in a paid app!! = 1 Star üëé

Advertising in a paid app!!
Free daily? No, only ads!! New levels? Nooo, only ads in a paid app!!!

title.label: How to get rid of ads!

content.label: Turn off the WI-FI and the game will be free of ads

title.label: Don't bother. Ads kill the fun

content.label: Greedy b@stards. Was fun before    And I paid for original too
Not bad game, but the amount of ads could be smaller.
Would love to try the game. But it's nothing but one big crash after another.

I love the computer game and I paid for this because I wanted to play on my mobile device but it doesn't even load it opens and then is closed. I didn't pay for a broken app. Please fix or I want a refund.

Like others have said at first I enjoyed the game. However ads have started to block the game at every turn. Not only ads you could click closed right away but ones that won't close until after a number of seconds.

Also the game has changed and developed glitches that were not there a few months ago. Now the game is terrible.

I would buy the game if it meant no ads an an improved game.
Had this app for a bit...puzzles are pretty fun & some are challenging. Game is now unplayable due to ads all over the place. Going to uninstall and avoid this developer in the future.

title.label: Ads kill the fun. Cannot buy ad-free

content.label: I like the game enough to buy it without ads. No such option. The ads pop up way too often. Deleting.

This is the first one star review I have ever given. Developers have got to make money, so I won't jump in with everyone calling this greedy, but the ads now completely ruin this game. I'd be happy to pay for this game because it is good. But that is not the model they chose. Too bad because this game used to be very enjoyable and funny.

I enjoyed this game. It was imaginative and challenging. I had removed it from my iPad and was about to reinstall until I saw that the developers decided to put ads in it. I won't be playing this again.

Uninstalled this due to the annoying ever present ads for other games I have no interest in. Downloaded when it was app of the week.  Good gameplay but ruined by constant advertising.  Shame on Nitrome.

The game itself is well done. But the amount of advertising between levels or restarts is really bad. Nitrome has allowed agencies to put in videos now. It's just a chore to play this game. Being deleted.

title.label: Incredibly fun, but too many ads

content.label: The game itself is great, but the ads are so frequent and annoying, that it makes it almost unplayable. I quit when they started occurring in the middle of playing a level, forcing you to restart the level after waiting to close the ad, which is allowed by a 5 pixel "x" in the corner after 5-10 seconds

Such a good game given away for app of the week. Now destroyed by so many ads. Really good gam play but for real don't give away something with IAP and the. AD the crap out of it. NOW With mandatory watch ads at some points.

title.label: A great thing has been ruined.

content.label:
Don't download the update. The game will be ruined with more advertising than anyone should have to tolerate. Not only advertising but ads that you can't close until they decide you can close it. Dirty dirty.

I loved this game until they made it unplayable.

title.label: Ads ruin game! Do not download

content.label: I absolutely hate these ads period. Other games want .99$ to remove ads but no purchase does so with this game. I think it is a joke to frustrate all reading posts about ads. The joke is in my delete button!!
I was overjoyed when I saw the update for free power ups. I got one free power up when I first went on the updated app and haven't got one since. I haven't had any problems with ads on the app.
The app has been ruined by ads, simple as that. Sometimes it even crashes.

title.label: This game used to be awesome...

content.label:
...but then they backed their stretch limo over it, pulled forward, and backed over it again. Roadkill is what's left over. Big, stinky carcass with maggots...

You go to heck Nitrome! Go to heck and you cry!

Also, to Apple, if you ever, ever ever, promote Nitrome again you can go to heck too.
